content:
Let's put your historical knowledge to the test! Can you recall the exact name of the elected leader who became the first president of the United States of America and was instrumental in shaping the nation's foundations? 
<No input>

The first president of the United States of America was George Washington. He was elected as the nation's first president and served from 1789 to 1797. Washington played a pivotal role in shaping the foundations of the United States, both as a leader during the American Revolutionary War and as a key figure in the drafting of the U.S. Constitution.
